description: The attached data dictionary provides information on the 'Standing Offer (SO) -- Portable Toilet Rental Service' notice with the following specifications: ...
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement for Portable Toilet Rental Service**
==============================================================

### Title and Reference Information

* **Title:** Portable Toilet Rental Service
* **Reference Number:** WS4054997470-Doc4104696802
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4054997470

### Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** August 18, 2023, 14:00:00 (EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 17, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026

### Procurement Method and Criteria

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Scope of Work

The department is seeking a contractor to provide a portable toilet rental service for locations throughout 8 Wing Trenton and various satellite locations. The scope of work includes the provision of all labor, materials, and equipment required to meet the needs of the department.

### Contact and Procurement Information

* **Department:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contractor Contact:** Patrick Semple, PSPC / SPAC
* **Email:** [patrick.semple@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:patrick.semple@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Region:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Amendment

Please disregard the original posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on August 18, 2023, by 14:00:00 (EDT).

For more information, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16908684?extsite=MTY5MDg2ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16908684?extsite=MTY5MDg2ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)  [予]	push/videoArtisAdmin).sol
